page.title: 04HOUSING IN ILMINGTON
page.content: Some houses in the{village}are very old and very large.These large houses and the{cottages}in the village are much sought after.Many of the older houses have been beautifully{restored} .Some of these houses are up to{three {hundred}years old.These are in the{ {upper}part of the village and the newer houses are in the{lower}.Many of the older houses are built of{Cotswold stone from this area and are a{mellow {yellow}colour.{Ilmington School}has Cotswold stone at the front and side.Some of the newer houses in the village are built of brick but the ones built in the last thirty years are of stone.Most houses are of two storeys.There are now several bungalows.Many old{farmhouses}and buildings have been and are being{ {converted}into modern dwellings.
